description:
A great civilization once existed on this Earth. Possessing knowledge and scientific prowess far exceeding that of modern man, the relics of this ancient civilization remain hidden across this world even now. As high-speed communication networks cover the globe and the peering eyes of satellites are able to expose all secrets, the armies of great nations clash as they seek to uncover and research these artifacts, which possess an unfathomable “power.” A member of this ancient civilization carved a message into a plate: “Protect our relics from evil-doers.” Taking this message to heart, one organization aims to seal away this ancient civilization for good. The elite secret agents of this organization are known as…Spriggans.

(Source: Netflix)

tags.name: Lost Civilization
tags.description: Featuring a civilization with few ruins or records that exist in present day knowledge.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Post-Apocalyptic
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a world or civilization after a global disaster.

node.description:
[Official Website](https://hedzdayz.fullmecha.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/jnthed) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=4395) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/hedz_fullmecha/)


Sometimes known as JNT.
He used to be a game designer and a graphic artist.
Originating from [Kyoto Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/2/Kyoto-Animation), left the studio after the conclusion of Tamako Love Story.

__Hobby:__ Basketball

__[Website](https://taisei-iwasaki.com/)__ | __[Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/2eutad3VCXdembmIgWdwjH)__

__Taisei Iwasaki__ is a Japanese musician, composer and [gekiban](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%8A%87%E4%BC%B4) writer. He is known for composing music for various media like movies, dramas, commercials and anime. He mentions that his father is from Hakodate, and claims the city to be one of his favorites.

His hobby is basketball, and in regards to his hobby, he provides songs for [NBA](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/NBA)-programs.
